title: Which computer to get?
body:
I've made another thread on this 2 days ago, but now I'm curious which one to get.

Computer 1: 

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/cyberpowerpc-gamer-ultra-desktop-amd-fx-series-8gb-memory-1tb-hard-drive-black-blue/4593000.p?id=1219775850518&skuId=4593000

Comes with a Keyboard and Mouse but.. only 1TB and 8GB.

Computer 2:

http://www.ebay.com/itm/AMD-Quad-Core-Custom-Built-Gaming-PC-Computer-Desktop-4-0GHz-16GB-2TB-White-/351769466562?hash=item51e71816c2:g:L7cAAOSwbYZXcKAE

Comes with NO Mouse or keyboard but.. Has 2TB and 16GB.


Which one seems like the better buy overall?

replies.body: It's just better to build your own PC
Not a fan of AMD/Radeon so i say neither. Intel and Nvidia are just....better is all. I just got the new nvidia 1080 founder edition and its the greatest thing ever made on earth
